original_text: Bad words come out of their mouth, like a very bad smell. They tell lies all the time, so that people do wrong things. The things that they say hurt people, like a snake's poison. 3: See Psalm 5:9; 140:3. Bad words come out of their mouth, like a very bad smell. They tell lies all the time, so that people do wrong things. The things that they say hurt people, like a snake's poison. 3: See Psalm 5:9; 140:3. Bad words come out of their mouth, like a very bad smell.
korean_text: 그들의 목구멍은 열린 무덤이요 그 혀로는 속임을 일삼으며 그 입술에는 독사의 독이 있고

sentences.original_text: Bad words come out of their mouth
They tell lies all the time
so that people do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사람들이 잘못된 일을 하게 된다

sentences.original_text: The things that they say hurt people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 말하는 것들은 사람들을 상처 입힌다

sentences.original_text: Bad words come out of their mouth

so that people do wrong things
